issue.title: Format: Draft type metadata ("schemas") IDL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-58](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-58). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Related to ARROW-57. This will be a large effort as the type metadata will need to be adequate to meet the needs of a large number of systems and addition be open to future additions (i.e. more logical data types) without adding onerous complexity.
